action.action-desc: Mr. Wicker (for himself, Mr. Bennet, Mrs. Britt, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, Mr. Boozman, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Warnock, and Mr. Warner) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate advance refunding bonds.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Lifting Our Communities through Advance Liquidity for Infrastructure Act or the LOCAL Infrastructure Act.

subsection.text: The amendments made by section 13532 of Public Law 115â€“97 are repealed and the provisions of law amended by such section are restored as if such section had never been enacted.
The repeal made by this section shall take effect on the date of enactment of this Act.
